channel.title: When i spawn custome items, my client crashes

item.title: When i spawn custome items, my client crashes
item.dc:creator: @gzikuu gzikuu
item.description:
@gzikuu wrote:

202685:

well did u add the models to the client? like, log on and type “add model #”… if you did, take the .gz model file out of your folder or extract it as a .dat and u shoud be fine

i have done all that. its just when i spawn the item my client crashes and i cant do anything. Also when i try to access account i will need to delete item first from its acc file and then access it then.
some1 help me

Read full topic

item.source: When i spawn custome items, my client crashes

item.title: When i spawn custome items, my client crashes
item.dc:creator: @gzikuu gzikuu
item.description:
@gzikuu wrote:

before i even start, i want to say i am total begginer in this
i have followed this guide on how to add items to your server

now my problem
so i have been doing exatcly the same thing as in video above however when i try to spawn the item, my server freezes and i cant do anything. i need to turn the client on and off. the worst thing is that i cant connect to the account i have spawned the item on.
can some1 help me. here is the code of the item i am trying to add
original
if(i == 13636) // change this if you need to “item number”
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//New option
class8.anInt174 = 14045; //Model ID // 20233
class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller
class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt165 = 14046;//male wearing //
class8.anInt200 = 14046;//female wearing //
class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves //
class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves //
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Bandos whip”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A whip from the warchief Graardor -SilentCJ-”.getBytes();//examin info
}

and after my modifications because other wise it will not compile. is my code broken or something?
case 13636:
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//New option
class8.anInt174 = 14045; //Model ID // 20233
class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller
class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt165 = 14046;//male wearing //
class8.anInt200 = 14046;//female wearing //
class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves //
class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves //
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Bandos whip”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A whip from bandos noob”.getBytes();
break;

i need help. if you want to i can record myself adding the code and trying to spawn the item.

Read full topic
